scripts.prepare: mustache -p registryDataSource.template.yaml config/mainnet.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && mustache config/mainnet.json src/helpers/ens.template.ts > src/helpers/ens.ts
scripts.deploy: graph deploy --debug dao-subgraph --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ dapplion/apm-dappnode-registries
